name: Lime
author: Kerry James

sections.description: Lime is a wierd name for a plugin, but this plugin is no average plugin. You can Integrate with Google services like Google Analytics and Google Webmaster Tools. You can manage permissions, update admin menu structure and much, much more.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Upload ‘lime’ to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Change the settings on the ‘Lime’ settings page
sections.changelog:
0.1.1

  • Fixed Google Bug

0.1

  • Added Google Toolkit
  • Added jQuery Toolkit
  • Added XML Sitemap
  • Added Manage Permissions
  • Created Lime Framework
